name: Space Colony (itch) (jurij)
description: I didn't like this task from the very beginning. I didn't really want to fly to a distant colony, with which communication was lost several months ago. Flying up to the colony, the feeling of anxiety and fear only intensified. Downstairs the lanterns burned faintly and no movement was visible. The colony was dead. Only scary sounds indicated that you were not alone. Kill zombies and crazy robots.
